name: den.ooo
author: Samuel Kopp (https://samuelkopp.de)
description: The sleek, feature-rich module registry for Deno. ðŸ“¦

scripts.build: esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --minify --format=cjs --target=es2022 --outfile=build/index.cjs && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --minify --format=esm --target=es2022 --outfile=build/index.mjs && esbuild src/resolvers/index.ts --bundle --minify --format=cjs --target=es2022 --outfile=build/index.cjs && esbuild src/resolvers/index.ts --bundle --minify --format=esm --target=es2022 --outfile=build/index.cjs && tsc
scripts.test: npm run build && tsc && node test.mjs
